mapper.sql: id as id , universityId as universityId , universityName as universityName , majorId as majorId , majorName as majorName , majorType as majorType , majorSubject as majorSubject , educationLevel as educationLevel , gainDegree as gainDegree , majorRank as majorRank , createDate as createDate , creator as creator , lastModDate as lastModDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , isDelete as isDelete
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_university_major
universityId = #{universityId},
universityName = #{universityName},
majorId = #{majorId},
majorName = #{majorName},
majorType = #{majorType},
majorSubject = #{majorSubject},
educationLevel = #{educationLevel},
gainDegree = #{gainDegree},
majorRank = #{majorRank},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
isDelete = #{isDelete},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_university_major
universityId = #{map.universityId},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
majorId = #{map.majorId},
majorName = #{map.majorName},
majorType = #{map.majorType},
majorSubject = #{map.majorSubject},
educationLevel = #{map.educationLevel},
gainDegree = #{map.gainDegree},
majorRank = #{map.majorRank},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
isDelete = #{map.isDelete},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_university_major ( universityId, universityName, majorId, majorName, majorType, majorSubject, educationLevel, gainDegree, majorRank, createDate, creator, lastModDate, lastModifier, isDelete ) VALUES ( #{map.universityId}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.majorId}, #{map.majorName}, #{map.majorType}, #{map.majorSubject}, #{map.educationLevel}, #{map.gainDegree}, #{map.majorRank}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.isDelete} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, universityId
, universityName
, majorId
, majorName
, majorType
, majorSubject
, educationLevel
, gainDegree
, majorRank
, createDate
, creator
, lastModDate
, lastModifier
, isDelete
FROM zgk_university_major
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND universityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityId} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND majorId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorId} , '%')
AND majorName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorName} , '%')
AND majorType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorType} , '%')
AND majorSubject like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorSubject} , '%')
AND educationLevel like CONCAT('%', #{condition.educationLevel} , '%')
AND gainDegree like CONCAT('%', #{condition.gainDegree} , '%')
AND majorRank like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majorRank} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND isDelete like CONCAT('%', #{condition.isDelete} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}

SELECT university.id as id , university.name as name , university.subjection as subjection , university.photo_url as photoUrl , university.property as property , leveldict.name as levelName, university.rank as rank , typedict.name as typeName, province.name as province, university.lastModifier as lastModifier FROM zgk_university university LEFT JOIN zgk_province province ON province.id = university.areaid LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict typedict ON typedict.dictId=university.type AND typedict.type='UNIVERSITY_TYPE' LEFT JOIN zgk_data_dict leveldict ON leveldict.dictId = university.educationLevel AND leveldict.type='EDULEVEL' where university.id in (select universityId from zgk_university_major mm where mm.majorId= #{condition.majorId} ) ORDER BY university.lastModifier DESC
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
